content: nordic star window valance do you remember those beautiful crocheted valances we gave this classic pattern a new look by crocheting it with the durable colour cake yarn durable colour cake 55% organic cotton & 45% anti pilling acrylic 250g/ 1000m/1094yd yarn a 6009 pistache pie 2 cakes from each cake you get about 1 40m/55 in width for the curtain provided you get the right gauge
